items.name: Chicken Tandoori
items.description: Chicken pieces marinated in yogurt, herbs, and spices, and grilled in tandoor. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Chicken Malai Kebab
items.description: White meat chicken pieces marinated overnight and grilled in tandoor. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Lamb Seekh Kebab
items.description: Lamb pieces marinated overnight and grilled in tandoor. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Tandoori Salmon
items.description: Marinated cubes of fresh salmon, grilled in tandoor, served with grilled vegetables. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Paneer Tikka
items.description: Marinated cubed cheese, grilled in tandoor, served with grilled vegetables. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Chicken Roll-Up
items.description: Made with freshly baked bread.

items.name: Paneer Roll-Up
items.description: Made with freshly baked bread and cheese.

items.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
items.description: Boneless chicken tandoori pieces in tangy tomato and cream sauce with exotic herbs and spices. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Chicken Korma
items.description: Boneless chicken pieces cooked in cream sauce with cashews and raisins. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Chicken Curry
items.description: Boneless chicken cooked with onions and garlic in delectable curry sauce. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Chicken Vindaloo
items.description: Cooked in spicy curry sauce with potatoes and vinegar. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Lamb Vindaloo
items.description: Succulent pieces of extra lean lamb cooked in tomato, vinegar, and onion sauce, with herbs and spices. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Saag Paneer
items.description: Fresh spinach and home style cheese cooked with a touch of onions and ginger. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Chana Masala
items.description: Soaked overnight, cooked with tomatoes and herbs in curry sauce. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Aloo Mutter
items.description: Fresh green peas with potatoes in onion and tomato sauce. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Potato Curry
items.description: Made with fresh potatoes, yogurt, and spices. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Daal
items.description: Black, green, and yellow lentils. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Nan
items.description: Leavened bread. Made in authentic clay-lined tandoor oven.

items.name: Tandoori Roti
items.description: Whole wheat bread. Made in authentic clay-lined tandoor oven.

items.name: Garlic Nan
items.description: Topped with fresh garlic and cilantro. Made in authentic clay-lined tandoor oven.

items.name: Onion Nan
items.description: Layered with diced onions and seasoning. Made in authentic clay-lined tandoor oven.

items.name: Aloo Nan
items.description: Layered with seasoned mashed potatoes. Made in authentic clay-lined tandoor oven.

items.name: Spinach Nan
items.description: Layered with spinach and home style cheese. Made in authentic clay-lined tandoor oven.

items.name: Chicken Nan
items.description: Layered with diced grilled chicken kabob. Made in authentic clay-lined tandoor oven.

items.name: Peshawari Nan
items.description: Sweet bread layered with raisins and nuts and garnished with coconut. Made in authentic clay-lined tandoor oven.

items.name: Combo 1
items.description: Choice of one chicken entree and one vegetable entree. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: All Meat Combo 1
items.description: Choice of two chicken entrees. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Combo 2
items.description: Choice of one chicken entree, one vegetable entree, and one appetizer. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: All Meat Combo 2
items.description: Choice of two chicken entrees and one appetizer. Served with basmati rice or plain nan bread.

items.name: Kheer
items.description: Rice pudding.
